A

A - Class in asteroid
Entry point to look up functions and utilities to work with nodes, expressions, statements, node utils...etc
A() - Constructor for class asteroid.A
 
A.PHASE_GLOBAL - Enum in asteroid
Compilation phases available for global transformations:

SEMANTIC_ANALYSIS CANONICALIZATION INSTRUCTION_SELECTION CLASS_GENERATION OUTPUT FINALIZATION
A.PHASE_LOCAL - Enum in asteroid
Compilation phases available for local transformations.
A.TO - Enum in asteroid
Targets available to apply a specific transformation

AST
asteroid - package asteroid
This package contains:
Classes to implement a local AST transformation Classes to access builder to create: nodes, expressions, statements Classes to make it easier to access AST node values Classes to check AST nodes Most of the times you can access all these functionalities through the A class
asteroid.global - package asteroid.global
This package contains classes to create global AST transformations
asteroid.internal - package asteroid.internal
Internal: This package contains AST transformations to get rid of boilerplate code when creating a local AST transformation.
asteroid.local - package asteroid.local
This package contains classes to create local AST transformations
asteroid.nodes - package asteroid.nodes
This package contains classes to build ASTNode instances
asteroid.utils - package asteroid.utils
This package contains utility classes

GlobalTransformation - Annotation Type in asteroid.global
Can be used when declaring an implementation of GlobalTransformationImpl to reduce the boilerplate code needed:

No need to provide GroovyASTTransformation Limits the compilation phases to avoid using a non allowed phase
GlobalTransformationImpl - Class in asteroid.global
This class applies all transformers provided by the method getTransformers in order to all class nodes present in a given source unit instance.
GlobalTransformationImpl() - Constructor for class asteroid.global.GlobalTransformationImpl

Local - Annotation Type in asteroid.local
Marks a given annotation as a local AST transformation
LocalTransformation - Class in asteroid.internal
Reduces the boiler plate code when declaring an annotation as possible target for a given transformation.
LocalTransformation() - Constructor for class asteroid.internal.LocalTransformation
 
LocalTransformation - Annotation Type in asteroid.local
Can be used when declaring an implementation of LocalTransformationImpl to reduce the boilerplate code needed:

No need to implement constructor () No need to provide GroovyASTTransformation Limits the compilation phases to avoid using a non allowed phase
LocalTransformationImpl<ANNOTATION,ANNOTATED extends org.codehaus.groovy.ast.AnnotatedNode> - Class in asteroid.local
This class is an abstraction to process certain nodes annotated with a specific annotation node type

Types indicate wich nodes are affected:

Lets say we wanted to build a transformation to transform methods annotated by @MyAnnotation 


 public class MyCustomTransformation extends LocalTransformationImpl<MyAnnotation, MethodNode> {
     public abstract void doVisit(AnnotationNode annotation, final MethodNode annotated, final SourceUnit source){
         // implementation
     }
 }
LocalTransformationImpl() - Constructor for class asteroid.local.LocalTransformationImpl
Default constructor
LocalTransformationImpl(Class<ANNOTATION>, Class<ANNOTATED>) - Constructor for class asteroid.local.LocalTransformationImpl
Default constructor
LocalTransformationTransformation - Class in asteroid.internal
This transformation makes easier to declare a given local transformation.
LocalTransformationTransformation() - Constructor for class asteroid.internal.LocalTransformationTransformation
